alert.note: Alert for Clark; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 5:21PM EDT until May 26 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clark County in central Kentucky... Eastern Madison County in central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 520 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Richmond to near Locust Branch, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Winchester and Harris Ferry around 540 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
